headline.main: Our Towns; Don't Go in the Water, or the Sun, or the Shade, Or . . .

docs.abstract: Essay notes summer hazards that include lyme disease from ticks, bites from sharks, cancer from exposure to sun, along with myriad other ways to spoil summer fun; photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: AH, summertime. Kick back. Relax. Get out of the office, the house, the factory. Enjoy the sun, the surf, the woods. Do something different. Live a little. You've earned it.
docs.snippet: AH, summertime.    Kick back. Relax. Get out of the office, the house, the factory. Enjoy the sun, the surf, the woods. Do something different. Live a little. You've earned it.
